column1: The local fire department is owned and operated by the Cosumnes Community Services District. Founded in 1893
column2: Elk Grove's Fire Department started with a single hose cart and a small group of dedicated volunteers. From these humble beginnings
column3: the Department has forged a lasting presence in the community. Continued growth and innovation in the fire service has prompted a diverse array of new Fire Department projects and responsibilities. Each year
column4: the Fire Prevention Bureau conducts hundreds of new construction inspections and plan reviews and actively implements annual weed abatement and fireworks enforcement campaigns. Moreover
column5: the Public Education Division coordinates a number of safety activities including "Change Your Clock-Change Your Smoke Detector Batteries" Campaign
column7: the Life Jacket Loan-Out Program and Car Seat Safety Inspections. A new Special Operations Division was formed in 2007 that oversees the specialized rescue
column9: and disaster preparedness needs for the Cosumnes CSD Fire Department.

column1: Galt operates under an elected council form of government. The Mayor of Galt is peer elected by the entire City Council. Currently
column2: the council members (with end of term in parentheses) are: Mayor Paul Sandhu (2022)
column5: Council Member Paige Lampson (2020) and Council Member Shawn Farmer (2022).In the California State Legislature
column6: Galt is in the  5th Senate District
column9: represented by Democrat Jim Cooper.In the United States House of Representatives
column10: Galt is in California's  9th congressional district
column11: represented by Democrat Jerry McNerney.Current Sacramento County Supervisor Don Nottoli served as the youngest member of the Galt City Council in 1978 at just 23 years old
column12: while Andrew J. Meredith served as its youngest Mayor in 2007 at 27 years old.

column1: Galt has had a weekly newspaper

column3: since 1909. It has been owned and operated by the same family since 1959

column1: Galt Joint Union High School District operates public high schools.
Galt is home to many civic groups and clubs. The Galt Area Historical Society is very active and has more than 500 members. The Performing Animal Welfare Society is a place where retired
column2: abandoned or abused performing animals and victims of the exotic animal trade can live in peace and contentment. The Galt Lions Club is part of Lions International and helps the local visually impaired repair their vision.

column1: Galt is well known for the Flea Market
column2: also known as Galt Market.

column1: Cosumnes River country holds a very special place among California landscapes. The Cosumnes River Preserve was created to safeguard much of that landscape.
The city hosts an annual winter bird festival
column2: in conjunction with the Cosumnes River Preserve
